page.title: 11LIVING IN A PUB.
page.content: This is about my home life. I live in the{Swan pub}in Ford End. We have a cleaner called Daphne and severel other people work for us including Jamie's Mum. she cooks the food with my Mum. Every Saturday we are allowed to have a sweet and a coke. It is a{Ridley's}pub.They deliver the beer. It is kept in wooden barrels because the beer tastes better than in metal ones. Some of the beer is pumped from barrels in the celler though plastic tubes to the bar.The drink that we sell most is beer. Dad has just built a patio garden at the back where people can sit and have a drink.
